channel.title: Long-term Growth on FinanClub

item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:158 Chances: Analysts report improved demand and new business signings, particularly in artificial intelligence and cloud infrastructure. Company won third annual Bear Institute Pediatric Accelerator Challenge, showcasing commitment to digital health innovation for children. Oracle chosen by SmarTone to transform its Business Support Systems, indicating strong customer confidence in Oracle’s offerings.
